BreadcrumbsBySlug.order-birth-certificate: Order a copy of my birth certificate
BreadcrumbsBySlug.notify-death: Notify a death to government departments
BreadcrumbsBySlug.authority: Do you have authority to continue?

DetailsSummaryForm.title: Confirm your application
DetailsSummaryForm.disclaimerText: By continuing you are confirming that, to the best of your knowledge, the details you are providing are correct and you are consenting to us submitting these details to ID verification agencies to check your identity.
DetailsSummaryForm.detailsSummary: How will DVA use my data?
DetailsSummaryForm.detailsText: A long detailed description of what DVA will use the data and something about GDPR probably. We all appreciate some good copy.

AddressForm.warningText: Enter your details exactly as they appear on your identity document.
AddressForm.searchHint: Enter an Eircode or street (for example, F91 DK74 or Ballincar Heights)
AddressForm.selectHint: Choose your address from the drop-down list

LocalHealthOfficeForm.selectHint: Select your local Health Office from the list below

ProofOfAddressForm.infoTitle: You'll now need to upload proof of address
ProofOfAddressForm.instructionRequirement: This can be a recent utility bill; bank statement; or tax documents.
ProofOfAddressForm.instructionDisclaimer: A mobile phone bill is not acceptable.
ProofOfAddressForm.detailsSummary: Unable to confirm online? See how you can confirm at your local authority
ProofOfAddressForm.detailsText: This is the content for writing well for the web.
ProofOfAddressForm.documentsTitle: What identity documents do you have?
ProofOfAddressForm.documentsDisclaimer: This will be used to confirm your identity (must be no more than 3 months old).
ProofOfAddressForm.noDocuments: I do not have any of these documents

NotifyDeathRequiredInfoForm.infoTitle: You will need the following to proceed:
NotifyDeathRequiredInfoForm.firstRequirementDescription: The registrar gave you this when the death was registered. It is 12 digits and a mix of numbers and letters. For example. AB 123 C 456 DE 7
NotifyDeathRequiredInfoForm.secondRequirementTitle: Surname of the person who's died
NotifyDeathRequiredInfoForm.detailsSummary: Unable to confirm online? See how you can confirm at your local authority
NotifyDeathRequiredInfoForm.detailsText: This is the content for writing well for the web.

NotifyDeathDetailsForm.title: Enter the following details
NotifyDeathDetailsForm.warningText: Enter the details exactly as they appear on the death certificate
NotifyDeathDetailsForm.firstInputDescription: The registrar gave you this when the death was registered. It is 12 digits and a mix of numbers and letters. For example. AB 123 C 456 DE 7
NotifyDeathDetailsForm.secondInputTitle: Surname of the person who has died

AuthorityCheckForm.title: Do you have authority to continue?
AuthorityCheckForm.detailsSummary: How do I know if I have authority?
AuthorityCheckForm.detailsText: This is the content for writing well for the web.

NotifyDeathConfirmNotificationForm.title: Confirm your notification
NotifyDeathConfirmNotificationForm.detailsSummary: How will DVA use my data?
NotifyDeathConfirmNotificationForm.detailsText: This is the content for writing well for the web.
NotifyDeathConfirmNotificationForm.deceasedSurname: Surname of the person who has died

PaymentSuccessful.title: What happens next?
PaymentSuccessful.body: Once approved your driving licence will be available in your Digital Wallet and will be sent to you by post and you should receive it within 7 days.

PaymentError.tryAgain: Please return to My Portal and attempt the payment again

ApplicationSuccessful.title: What happens next?
ApplicationSuccessful.renewDriversLicenceBody: Once approved your driving licence will be available in your Digital Wallet and will be sent to you by post and you should receive it within 7 days.
ApplicationSuccessful.orderEHICBody: Once approved your EHIC will be available in your Digital Wallet and will be sent to you by post and you should receive it within 7 days.
ApplicationSuccessful.orderBirthCertificateBody: Once approved your birth certificate will be sent to you by post and you should receive it within 7 days.

title.mid: Your driving licence renewal is being processed
title.post: Your driving licence is now available

description.mid: We will notify you again when your new licence is available in your Digital Wallet
description.post: It is now available in your digital wallet and will be posted to you

title.pre: Continue your application for an EHIC
title.mid: Your application for an EHIC is being processed
title.rejected: Your application for an EHIC is rejected

title.post: The copy of your birth certificate is now available
title.rejected: Your application for a copy of your birth certificate is rejected

title.base: Notify a death to government departments

UserConsentFlow.title: Welcome to your portal
UserConsentFlow.disclaimer: As part of our service, certain data associated with your account will be stored and saved to your profile to enhance your user experience and provide personalised features. We prioritise the security and privacy of your data, and you have the option to agree or disagree with this data storage. You can change this decision later.
UserConsentFlow.agree: I agree to save my data
UserConsentFlow.detailsSummary: How will DVA use my data?

FeedbackBanner.bannerText: This is a new service - your <mail>feedback</mail> will help us to improve it.
